thread.title: MICHAEL Rutter Milton Keynes
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by MICHAEL Rutter Milton Keynes

author: MICHAEL Rutter Milton Keynes
title: MICHAEL Rutter Milton Keynes
text:
I have purchased the vertical blind and found the team very helpful
in my pre erection of the blind. They guided me and given me
instructions and where to find them. The instructions were very
helpful and I would take note to use the small bracket for holding
the cords together in place, this I found gives the correct tension
when using the cords to open/turn the blind
Mike Rutter Milton Keynes
